text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hey, Tama-chan. What do you plan on doing if I let you through?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Well I'm worried about you three, so I was gonna offer to help…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: More importantly… You wouldn't happen to be planning on mediating the conversations between those two, now would you?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Eh? How the hell'd you…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you really are quite a nice child, Tama-chan. You're a child that would act quickly for anyone's sake. However…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: It'd be like makin' a child who hasn't learned math yet keep track of their family's finances. No one'd do somethin' so cruel. Sometimes you just need the right people for the job, doncha think?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ahh, no worries! I'll take care of it, so just leave it there.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Why don't we wait here for a bit…?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Wait!?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: It's not that I'm telling you to stay completely out of these kinds of things. However, you also shouldn't just do the things for them.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Just give them a little bit of support… then wait. Don't tell them that they can't do something. Tell them that they'll soon be able to do it with a little bit of help.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Believe in them and watch over them. Those are ways in which you can show you care.

text_block_list.name: Rob Roy & Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Tama-san, I'm so sorry… I should have come with… Creek-san. The mystery has been unraveled, therefore we should all reconvene…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Because the truth is… they're all capable of doing amazing things.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haa… I'm so glad that we were able to make it out of there…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Um, Rice-san… Were you able to speak with Bourbon-san at all…? Like when we were trapped inside of that haunted house…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eh? In the haunted house? Umm, while we were trapped…
(Clunkaclunk!!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hyaa!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice-san, your reactions are quite telling… They are truly beneficial when determining how one should act in these types of situations.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eh… I… guess so?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: In the end, Bourbon-san did most of the unravelling while all I did was continuously get scared…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But I'm glad… Despite always bothering her, today I was at least of some use to Bourbon-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But all of this wouldn't have happened if you didn't invite me here, Rob Roy-san. Ehehe… Thank you so much for bringing me here.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I'm so glad… So glad that I was able to help you, Rice-san…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? Rob Roy-san…?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: When I invited you, and even after we arrived, I kept doubting whether this was a good idea… I kept worrying that I might be bothering the two of you…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ? I-I didn't think of you as a bother? Actually, I thought you were really amazing today…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: That's all thanks to Sweep-san. I actually borrowed this wand from her…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I wanted to be able to express myself just like Sweep-san does. That's why… I created a witch persona.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Persona…?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Experiencing one's suppressed desires… Becoming someone different from oneself… I think that is the true purpose of Halloween, to achieve these desires through a transformation.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Could it be… this entire time… behind that witch persona… you were really scared?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… Yes, but I thought you were in trouble so I wanted to help. I know it was kind of a selfish thing to do though…!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Rice-chan, Rob Roy-chan. It's time for us to go to the next area.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ! Ah, okay…! U-Umm… but there's one thing that I'd like to say…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Rice-san… you've been worrying about annoying others, but to me that just shows how caring you are. I just wanted to let you know that…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rob Roy-san… …………………
